org.apache.hadoop.fs.statistics

Interface IOStatisticsSource

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MultipartUploader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMultipartUploader, BlockCompressorStream, BlockDecompressorStream, BufferedIOStatisticsInputStream, BufferedIOStatisticsOutputStream, CompressionInputStream, CompressionOutputStream, CompressorStream, CryptoFSDataInputStream, CryptoFSDataOutputStream, DecompressorStream, FSDataInputStream, FSDataOutputStream, GzipCodec.GzipOutputStream, PassthroughCodec.PassthroughDecompressorStream, SourceWrappedStatistics, SplitCompressionInputStream

    @InterfaceStability.Unstable
public interface IOStatisticsSource
    A source of IO statistics.

    These statistics MUST be instance specific, not thread local.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default IOStatistics getIOStatistics()
      Return a statistics instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getIOStatistics

        default IOStatistics getIOStatistics()
        Return a statistics instance.

        It is not a requirement that the same instance is returned every time. IOStatisticsSource.

        If the object implementing this is Closeable, this method may return null if invoked on a closed object, even if it returns a valid instance when called earlier.

        Returns:
        an IOStatistics instance or null
